definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

pinyin: Ke4 lai2 si1 le4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: He also became embroiled in controversy surrounding the government bail-out of Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也因政府保释克莱斯勒而被卷入巨大争议。

sentences.english: We Canadians are close neighbors. Give me that Chrysler at half price"?
sentences.chinese: 我们是你们的邻居，那辆克莱斯勒半价给我好吗？

sentences.english: Right now, Chrysler holds the upper hand in the merger.
sentences.chinese: 目前，克莱斯勒已在合并中取得先手。

sentences.english: The 12 Hours of Sebring race was cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 他们还取消了克莱斯勒赛百灵赛车12小时比赛。

sentences.english: And Chrysler is on the verge of exiting from its bankruptcy in record time.
sentences.chinese: 还有，克莱斯勒快要从破产中快速的脱身而出了。

sentences.english: One of the most vulnerable, CNW's survey found, was Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 调查发现，三大厂家中目前最脆弱的是克莱斯勒。

sentences.english: They were gut-wrenching, but absolutely necessary for Chrysler's survival, " said James Press, the president of Chrysler."
sentences.chinese: 但是对克莱斯勒的生存来说，这个决定是绝对必要的。

sentences.english: A year after bankruptcy, Chrysler is on the rebound.
sentences.chinese: 破产后一年，克莱斯勒一直在不断重整旗鼓。

sentences.english: The government has also been urgence Chrysle urging Chrysler to join with Fiat.
sentences.chinese: 政府已经敦促克莱斯勒加入菲亚特。

sentences.english: " Found "on" the factory radio to replace the GMC or Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 查找无线电厂为您更换或GMC的克莱斯勒汽车。

sentences.english: View from Empire State Building to Chrysler Building and Queensboro Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 从帝国大厦向克莱斯勒大厦与皇后大桥眺望。

sentences.english: But Mr. Marchionne will have to get Chrysler to hit the gas to avoid a delay.
sentences.chinese: 马尔其奥尼必须让克莱斯勒竭尽全力才能避免延迟。

sentences.english: GM and Chrysler's product-development operations are only now being reshaped.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车和克莱斯勒的产品开发部门现在才进行重组。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama also said Chrylser Chrysler will seek bank crip bankruptcy protection in court.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马先生也说过，克莱斯勒将在法庭寻求破产保护。

sentences.english: The move has been approved by the bankruptcy courts.
sentences.chinese: 克莱斯勒的这一行为已被破产法院批准。

sentences.english: Fiat veteran was parachuted in to take charge of the Chrysler brand.
sentences.chinese: 一名菲亚特的元老级任务被任命接管克莱斯勒品牌。
